node.title: Proud or Humble?
node.description: What is pride? What is humility? Genuine pride can be experienced in sentiments of satisfaction for a job well done or in your children or grandchildren. The pride the Bible warns us of however is very different. It involves placing a higher estimation on yourself that you ought to. Equally dangerous is false humility, a self-depreciating mentality that underestimates what a person is in Christ. How can a person find the middle of road, and what does any of this have to do with Paul's liberating statement, "I am what I am by the grace of God"? Find out in this week's exciting presentation with Pastor Chris Buttery.
